description:
My place is close to Schomburg Center For Research In Black Culture
Apollo theater, African Flea Market, Historical Places of Worship (Abyssinian Baptist Church, Mother Zion, and First Corinthians Baptist Church) Harlem's Best Restaurants (Amy Ruth's, Sylvia's, Red Rooster) Harlem's downtown 125th Street, and walking distance to All of Harlem's Historical sites.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets) allowed 20 lbs./under $100 duration.

I will be able to assist guess with  basic needs during there stay.

Guess will be charged $100 if Key Fob for enter is lost or damaged . $50 for key.
name: Studio Apartment, Harlem NY, Gated Community
review: C was so great and communicative and helpful! Will totally stay here again when I'm in the city again and need my own private abode.
